results.deck: Illusion Softworks, a.s. (now known as 2K Czech) is a game development company, which is responsible (amongst others) for the Mafia series.
results.description:
Illusion Softworks is now known as 2K Czech. Before they started to work for 2K they made their mark with the successful Mafia game.
 

Games

Mafia
Hidden & Dangerous
Hidden & Dangerous 2
Vietcong 
Vietcong 2
results.name: Illusion Softworks, a.s.
